column4: Yo! Say I want to copy an index.php to every sub-dir in my web dir with a simple command, how could I acheive this?
so select the correct device node.  i was playing off of your information.
maybe it should be /dev/sg2 instead of /dev/sdg2 ?
if you can mount sg2 you are miles ahead of me.
you can maybe find the device node with command    sudo fdisk -l
i doubt it will break anything.  but i also doubt it will mount.
what or should i say where is this file system you want to mount ?
it is an SD card... MicroSD
ummm i'm not that familear with sd cards.  should be seen as an scsi device though.    try this   for q in g f e d c b a ;do file -s /dev/sd$q && return 0 ;done 2>/dev/null
then you may need a module inserted,  again you are playing just over the fence from me.   i'm not versed on sd cards.
you reading all this.    see tophyr and bzaks
ok you proved my assumption.  sd cards are seen as scsi devices.
as to why not that one. i have no idea.
